General.Name: Zhejiang Mtcn Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang MTCN Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing and selling of crystalline silicon and electronic components in China. It provides semiconductor wafers and silicon rods. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Changxing, China.

3.Name: Zhiping  Li
3.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. and Board Sec.
